revision.text:
<languages/> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Poni Meadow |image = [[File:Poni Meadow.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Poni Meadow. |tokens = 1,225,000 |location = North of Poni Plains. }}
'''Poni Meadow''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 121 tiles arranged in a 11x11 square, including 11 chest tiles, 41 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 16,659,968 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp ||rowspan=7|<center>[[File:Actor.png|40px]] Actor Meredith || rowspan=7|<center>[[File:Oricorio (Sensu).png|40px]] Oricorio (sensu) |- | [[File:Dratini.png|40px]] Dratini |- | [[File:Cottonee.png|40px]] Cottonee |- | [[File:Petilil.png|40px]] Petilil |- | [[File:Ribombee.png|40px]] Ribombee |- | [[File:Misdreavus.png|40px]] Misdreavus |- | [[File:Barboach.png|40px]] Barboach |- |}
